00024 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00025 class SimpleMapElem : public Linkable<SimpleMapElem<TKey, TValue> >
00026 {
00027     typedef Linkable<SimpleMapElem<TKey, TValue> > Base;
00028 
00029     public:
00030         SimpleMapElem(const TKey &key, const TValue &value) :
00031           m_key(key), m_value(value)
00032         {}
00033 
00034         TKey& GetKey()
00035             { return m_key; }
00036 
00037         TValue& GetValue()
00038             { return m_value; }
00039 
00040     private:
00041         TKey m_key;
00042         TValue m_value;
00043 
00044         friend class SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>;
00045 };

00122 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00123 class SimpleMap : public NonCloneable
00124 {
00125     public:
00126         typedef SimpleMapElem<TKey, TValue> Pair;
00127 
00128     public:
00131         class Iterator
00132         {
00133             protected:
00134                 Iterator(const SimpleMap &map) :
00135                     m_map(map),
00136                     m_cur_elem(map.m_head)
00137                 {}
00138 
00139             public:
00140                 BOOLEAN IsValid() const
00141                     { return m_cur_elem != 0; }
00142 
00143                 Pair& GetPair() const
00144                     {
00145                         ASSERT_DEBUG(m_cur_elem != 0);
00146                         return *m_cur_elem;
00147                     }
00148 
00149                 void Increment()
00150                     {
00151                         ASSERT_DEBUG(m_cur_elem != 0);
00152                         m_cur_elem = m_cur_elem->GetNext();
00153                     }
00154 
00155             private:
00156                 const SimpleMap &m_map;
00157                 Pair *m_cur_elem;
00158 
00159                 friend class SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>;
00160         };
00161 
00162     public:
00164         SimpleMap();
00165 
00167         virtual ~SimpleMap();
00168 
00174         TValue& operator[](const TKey &key);
00175 
00179         const TValue& operator[](const TKey &key) const;
00180 
00182         BOOLEAN Exists(const TKey &key) const;
00183 
00186         BOOLEAN Remove(const TKey &key);
00187 
00189         void RemoveAll();
00190 
00198         BOOLEAN Ok() const
00199             { return m_ok; }
00200 
00202         UINT GetSize() const;
00203 
00205         Iterator GetIterator() const;
00206 
00215         BOOLEAN GetValue(const TKey &key, TValue &value) const;
00216 
00217     private:
00219         mutable BOOLEAN m_ok;
00220 
00222         Pair *m_head;
00223 
00224         friend class Iterator;
00225 };

00227 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00228 SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::SimpleMap() :
00229     m_ok(TRUE),
00230     m_head(0)
00231 {
00232 }

00234 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00235 SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::~SimpleMap()
00236 {
00237     while (m_head != 0) {
00238         Pair *next = m_head->GetNext();
00239         delete m_head;
00240         m_head = next;
00241     }
00242 }
00243 
00244 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00245 TValue& SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::operator[](const TKey &key)
00246 {
00247     // Static value which is returned on out of memory error.
00248     static TValue s_err_val = TValue();
00249 
00250     m_ok = TRUE;
00251 
00252     // Search for an existing element for key.
00253     Pair *list = m_head;
00254     while (list != 0) {
00255         if (list->m_key == key) {
00256             return list->m_value;
00257         }
00258         list = list->GetNext();
00259     }
00260 
00261     // Insert new element for key at head.
00262     Pair *new_elem = new Pair(key, TValue());
00263 
00264     if (new_elem == 0) {
00265         m_ok = FALSE;
00266         return s_err_val;
00267     }
00268 
00269     new_elem->SetNext(m_head);
00270     m_head = new_elem;
00271 
00272     return m_head->m_value;
00273 }
00274 
00275 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00276 const TValue& SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::operator[](const TKey &key) const
00277 {
00278     // Static value which is returned on out of memory error.
00279     static TValue s_err_val = TValue();
00280 
00281     m_ok = TRUE;
00282 
00283     // Search for an existing element for key.
00284     Pair *list = m_head;
00285     while (list != 0) {
00286         if (list->m_key == key) {
00287             return list->m_value;
00288         }
00289         list = list->GetNext();
00290     }
00291 
00292     m_ok = FALSE;
00293 
00294     return s_err_val;
00295 }

00297 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00298 BOOLEAN SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::Exists(const TKey &key) const
00299 {
00300     Pair *list = m_head;
00301     while (list != 0) {
00302         if (list->m_key == key) {
00303             return TRUE;
00304         }
00305         list = list->GetNext();
00306     }
00307 
00308     return FALSE;
00309 }
00310 
00311 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00312 BOOLEAN SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::Remove(const TKey &key)
00313 {
00314     Pair *list = m_head, *prev = 0;
00315     while (list != 0) {
00316         if (list->m_key == key) {
00317             if (prev == 0) {
00318                 m_head = list->GetNext();
00319             }
00320             else {
00321                 prev->SetNext(list->GetNext());
00322             }
00323             delete list;
00324             return TRUE;
00325         }
00326         prev = list;
00327         list = list->GetNext();
00328     }
00329 
00330     return FALSE;
00331 }
00332 
00333 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00334 void SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::RemoveAll()
00335 {
00336     while (m_head != 0) {
00337         Pair *next = m_head->GetNext();
00338         delete m_head;
00339         m_head = next;
00340     }
00341 }
00342 
00343 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00344 UINT SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::GetSize() const
00345 {
00346     UINT size = 0;
00347     Pair *list = m_head;
00348     while (list != 0) {
00349         size++;
00350         list = list->GetNext();
00351     }
00352 
00353     return size;
00354 }

00358     SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::GetIterator() const
00359 {
00360     return SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::Iterator(*this);

00363 template <class TKey, class TValue>
00364 BOOLEAN SimpleMap<TKey, TValue>::GetValue(const TKey &key, TValue &value) const
00365 {
00366     value = operator[](key);
00367     return Ok();
00368 }
